ideas.prompt: Please generate three brief story ideas, of five to ten words each, that are appropriate for {age_min}-{age_max} year-old children. Do not number the list, or put periods on the end of the ideas.

morals.prompt: Please generate three moral lessons, of five to ten words each, that are appropriate for {age_min}-{age_max} year-old children. Do not number the list, or put periods on the end of the lessons.

story.prompt:
Please write a {author_style} children's story for {age_min}-{age_max} year-old children, about '{story_theme}'. The story should teach a valuable lesson on '{moral_lesson}'. Make the story engaging and age-appropriate. It should be {total_paragraphs} paragraphs long. After each paragraph, I will provide the input x/y (the xth paragraph out of y paragraphs) for you to generate the next paragraph. Please begin with the first paragraph:

1/{total_paragraphs}

illustration.prompt: Provide a concise description, prioritizing comma-separated keywords over fully descriptive sentences, of a potential visual representation of the following scene in less than 400 characters. The representation's style is inspired by {artist}, who is known for their uniquely {style} style. Focus on describing specific key elements, visual details, and styles. ```{story_passage}```

quirky, exaggerated, imaginative, playful, bold lines, limited color palette, surreal

charming, Nordic, dreamlike, muted colors, ink and watercolor, organic, minimalist
realistic, mysterious, atmospheric, monochromatic, pencil, chiaroscuro, detailed
minimalistic, black-and-white, pen and ink, simple, expressive, humorous, relatable
